name: Robert McCaffery
tagline: Developer, Analyst, Culinary Aficionado, Ukulele Enthusiast
body:
### Personal projects
* [Weekly Apps](http://weeklyapp.github.io/)
* [Ruby on Rails Calendar](http://cal.robertjmccaffery.com) (still in development)

### Professional projects
* [ICRAS](http://paperworkreduction.gov/)
* [DARMIS](http://darmis.ctacorp.com/authentication)
* [Healthcare Finder](http://finder.healthcare.gov/) (Video of President Obama demoing Healthcare Finder found [here](http://www.whitehouse.gov/blog/2010/07/28/not-your-ordinary-website-demo))
* [FAQ](http://answers.healthcare.gov/)
* HHS Clearance (no public URL)
* HHS Innovations (no public URL)
* HHS Breach - Public URL: [ocrnotifications.hhs.gov](ocrnotifications.hhs.gov) - Admin URL is not public
* DNS Tracker (no public URL)
* Press Release (no public URL)
* [HHS WCD File Transfer System](https://filetransfer.hhs.gov/filetransfer/)

### Find me on
* [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/robertmccaffery)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/robmc)
* [Flickr](http://www.flickr.com/photos/robertmccaffery/sets/)

### Education
* Master of Business Administration - 2008 - Christian Brothers University
* Graduate Certificate of Information Technology - 2008 - Christian Brothers University
* Bachelor of Science in Business Administration - 2007 - Christian Brothers University
    * Major - Information Technology Management
